sentences.en: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
Bronze is an alloy of copper and tin.
Costs rapidly escalated , and the potential " pay - off " for alloy development was diminishing.
sentences.cn: 费用增加, 而用于合金发展的 经费 来源却反而减少.

sentences.en: In the tranquillity she imparted there was an alloy of inexpressible sadness.
sentences.cn: 在她传播的这种宁静中,掺杂着一种无法表达的忧郁.

sentences.en: Salt water corroded the light alloy frames and the fabric wing - covering.
sentences.cn: 盐水对轻合金飞机构架和布质机翼蒙皮有腐蚀作用.

sentences.en: She's light as a feathermade of aircraft alloy.
sentences.cn: 它是用制造飞机的合金做的,因此象羽毛般轻便.

sentences.en: Show that it is possible to make the substitutional alloy brass.
sentences.cn: 试说明制造替代式合金黄铜.
制出一种叫做 “ 中间合金 ” 的东西.

sentences.en: The worker worked in a little copper with the alloy.
sentences.cn: 工人在合金里搀了一点铜.

sentences.en: This alloy is ever so strong.
This alloy is formed by the fusion of two types of metal.
sentences.cn: 这种合金是用两种金属熔合而成的.

sentences.en: This is not pure gold ; there is some alloy in it.
sentences.cn: 这不是纯金, 里面混有杂质.

sentences.en: We make good use of special plastics in place of alloy.
sentences.cn: 我们充分利用特种塑料来代替合金.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 合金铸件，合金铸造
非晶态合金，无定形合金

trans.tran_en: a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together
to mix one metal with another
to mix one metal with another
